trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Burlington
There were no other sightings in Burlington on or around January 31st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside on deck this morning and was admiring the moon, this extremely bright light was coming across the sky very slow around 100 knots from West to East on a clear sky at around 2500 feet, no locator lights blinking as with general aircraft, I watched it for around 20-30 seconds and went it got near moonlight I went inside to get my binoculars.. That was 5 seconds and when I came back out it had disappeared! There is no possible way at that speed it could have vanished in a clear wide open sky in that short about of time..
